question: Have you ever been on a date?
ans: Yes. I’ve even gone on more than 1 in a single day.
Yeah, but hasn’t everyone?
Kind of? I’m not sure if it counted as a date though.
No, not yet.

question: Have you ever asked for a stranger’s number?
ans: Of course! I’m not afraid to give them a call.
Yep, but I’ll likely wait a few days to text them.
Probably, but I’d prefer sliding into their DMs.
No! I wouldn’t dare ask for someone’s personal information.

question: Have you ever snuck out?
ans: Duh! I don’t stick to a curfew.
Yeah, but only if my friends are too.
Kind of, but I left a note for my family saying where I went.
Nope, and I never plan to.

question: Have you ever streaked?
ans: Totally!
Yes, but only because I was dared too.
Accidentally. My swimsuit fell off in the water.
No! That would be indecent.

question: Have you ever been busted by the cops?
ans: Totally! More than once.
Once.
No, but I’ve been close.
Absolutely not!

question: Have you ever been skinny dipping?
ans: Of course! I do it every summer.
Yeah, but only because my friends put me up to it.
No, but I would consider doing it.
Nope. Anyone could be watching.

question: Have you ever made out with someone in public?
ans: Of course! I love a public makeout.
Yeah, but I only do it occasionally.
Not really. Only if my partner initiates it.
No. Intimacy belongs at home.

question: Have you ever cheated on a test?
ans: Yep, and I’d do it again!
Once. But only because I had to!
Does it count if the teacher gives you the answer?
Definitely not! That’s despicable!

question: Have you ever dated more than 1 person at once?
ans: Of course. I have to keep my options open.
Yeah, but it was because of a miscommunication.
I don’t know. Does crushing on a celebrity while I’m in a relationship count?
Definitely not! I’d consider that cheating.

question: Have you ever been to a party?
ans: Of course! I’ll show up to any party, any time.
Yep, but only if a friend invites me.
Sure, if you count a movie night with my friends.
Nope. Parties just aren’t my thing.

question: Have you ever watched a dirty movie?
ans: Totally, and it was marvelous.
Yeah, but I wasn’t really paying attention.
Possibly. Does a makeout scene count as dirty?
Ew, no! My eyes don’t want to see that.

question: Have you ever gotten a tattoo?
ans: Yes—I’ve got 2 or more!
Yeah, I have one.
Nope, but I’d like one in the future.
No, and I never want one.
